messages.subject: Re: SHQ updates and announcements
messages.msgSnippet: I ve noticed a few mistakes in regard of the Okita information. 1. Okita was born in Tenpou 13 (1842) or Tenpou 15 (1844.) 2. Okita was born in the Shirakawa
messages.messageBody:
I've noticed a few mistakes in regard of the Okita information.

1. Okita was born in Tenpou 13 (1842) or Tenpou 15 (1844.)

2. Okita was born in the Shirakawa domain's mansion in Edo. He wasn't born in Shirakawa.

3. His birth name (in full) was "Okita Soujirou Fujiwara no Harumasa". Before he went to
Kyoto In 1863, he changed his name to "Okita Souji Fujiwara no Kaneyoshi." Other than his
full name, he could be referred as Okita Souji, Okita Souji Kaneyoshi, or Fujiwara no
Kaneyoshi. In the case of his birth name, he could be referred as Okita Soujirou, Fujiwara
no Harumasa, or Okita Soujirou Harumasa (but never Okita Harumasa or Okita Harumasa
Soujirou!)

Family Name: Okita
Given Name/First Name Equivalent: Soujirou, Souji
Family Clan Name:Fujiwara
Formal Given Name/Middle Name Equivalent: Harumasa, Kaneyoshi

4. His father's name was Okita Katsujiro (?-1845); his oldest sister's name was Okita Mitsu
(1833-1907.)

messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for posting it up Sec! Ahahaha this one is so slow sometimes. But please do consider, there s a plethora of doujinshi available... Ehehehe, mostly RK
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for posting it up Sec! Ahahaha this one is so slow sometimes.
But please do consider, there's a plethora of doujinshi available...
Ehehehe, mostly RK Saitou but there's PMK and Kaze Hikaru as well. Oh a
non-shinsengumi too.

~Kizu

messages.subject: SHQ updates and announcements
messages.msgSnippet: Numerous http://www.shinsengumihq.com updates are listed on the index page special thanks to Wu Jiaxin for her Okita information and Hirotada Tokugawa (Shimazu
messages.messageBody:
Numerous http://www.shinsengumihq.com updates are listed on the index
page special thanks to Wu Jiaxin for her Okita information and
Hirotada Tokugawa (Shimazu Masayoshi) for the Kondou info page. Links
to both their sites are included right on the pages they added.
Anyone who wishes to *add or *correct information we already have on
SHQ.com may email the site.

Please visit the link to MIRROR MIRROR and learn about the first ever
original novel in English featuring the Shinsengumi.

Please check out this wonderful fund raiser
Your chance to acquire RARE doujinshi and help victims of Hurricane
Katrina
http://www.hajimenokizu.com/journal/index.php?itemid=32

http://www.shinsengumifics.com/
is up and running you can read and review fics here!
